prompt: Redesign the SoundMaxx home dashboard as a premium desktop web app interface mockup. Keep the same page intent and structure: top navigation with brand at left and utility/action controls at right, a large hero panel with strong headline and two CTAs, right-side value proposition cards, and a tools section with three product cards. Make it a fresh redesign, not a copy.
scene: dark futuristic studio SaaS dashboard for audio creators
subject: home page for SoundMaxx audio tools platform
style: high-fidelity product UI mockup, polished and shippable
composition: 1536x1024 landscape desktop frame, balanced 12-column layout, strong visual hierarchy, generous spacing
lighting: soft bloom and edge glow, subtle depth and glass highlights
palette: deep navy and midnight blue base, cyan and sky-blue accents, restrained neutral text
materials: frosted glass cards, thin neon outlines, subtle grain texture, rounded panels
constraints: single cohesive design language shared with companion tool pages; keep content blocks clear and realistic; no watermark
negative: cluttered layout, oversaturated neon, tacky cyberpunk effects, unreadable text, stock-photo look

prompt: Create a redesigned SoundMaxx tool page for Stem Isolation. Preserve the original information architecture while restyling: top nav, large title/description hero on left, workflow checklist panel on right, lower section split into Upload and Process cards with controls relevant to stem separation.
subject: Stem Isolation processing interface
composition: 1536x1024 landscape, large hero container with right workflow card, two equal lower panels
lighting: subtle blue glow with soft gradients
palette: consistent shared palette: dark navy surfaces with bright cyan interactive accents
materials: glassmorphism cards, 1px luminous borders, soft shadows
constraints: keep same functional sections as source page but with clearly new visual styling; consistent aesthetic family with all other pages; no watermark
negative: layout drift away from tool-page pattern, excessive decoration, blurry controls

prompt: Create a redesigned SoundMaxx tool page for Mastering with the same overall section structure: header/nav, hero with page title and description, workflow steps panel, upload card, and process/settings card including mastering profile controls.
subject: Mastering tool interface
composition: 1536x1024 desktop, modular card system, strong alignment and spacing rhythm
lighting: controlled cool highlights and subtle panel glow
palette: dark navy foundation with cyan and ice-blue accents; neutral off-white typography
materials: frosted overlays, smooth gradients, thin strokes
constraints: must feel part of the same family as other SoundMaxx redesigned pages; preserve tool workflow clarity; no watermark

prompt: Create a redesigned SoundMaxx tool page for Loudness Report. Preserve the same page architecture and UX flow: title hero, right workflow panel, lower upload area, and processing settings focused on loudness targets and report outputs.
